channel.title: NGW - server - development
channel.description:
[b][u]~~~~~ NGW development team ~~~~~[/u][/b] As most will remember the famous NGW server which was made from scratch , and Very stable, which was on a deciated host, about 5 months ago, pictures below to remind you of it, made my the offical ~ the guardian ~ mr.dune ~ oakstreet ~~ i've had full permission from mr.dune as a great friend to re build it , and put it back on a dedicated host once again.
[b][u]~~~~~ server development team ~~~~~[/u][/b] i'll be needing around 5 members to help me with this big project, u'll be application for, if you don't get accepted, your name wont be on this list, or i'll say in a post. 1.im a noob ( luke ) 2. 3. 4. 5. [b][u]~~~~~ forum team ~~~~~[/u][/b] needing around 3 people to help me and others in the team with webdesign, ect, and makeing a sucessfull forum for the server. 1.volar (me) aka the volarness. 2. 3. [b][u]story of the server[/u][/b] Mr.dune after hosting this server had decided to quit, when half way through of editing it, me and others of the development team will be restoreing the server, and fhinishing off the work, that him himself, didnt. fair credits will be given to the people who did the most work ect. around the server, and also a menu on the server, which will tell the restoreing credits of the people who helped me, Must include the offical people who did make the server from scratch. [b][u]pictures to remind you of the server if you played it[/u][/b] [IMG]http://i5.tinypic.com/71wicep.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i9.tinypic.com/6kudaq9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i15.tinypic.com/6lwpco8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i18.tinypic.com/89vubld.jpg[/img]

item.title: NGW - server - development
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

the application
what servers have you made?=coded most of: amandascape + helped tiny bit bashscape pk…(coded my self "xtremescape - never relesed)
are you Very experienced with what were dealing with?=yes
would you put time and effort into getting your work done=yes
would you share information with us to try and improve=yes
do you understand what you are dealing with in posting the application=yes
if any “other” work needs doing will you do it?=yes ill try my very best.
what vouch’s have you got aka, people that will vouch for you, saying your good at it =wth does this mean??

Read full topic

@volarscape wrote:

~~~~~ NGW development team ~~~~~
As most will remember the famous NGW server which was made from scratch , and Very stable, which was on a deciated host, about 5 months ago, pictures below to remind you of it, made my the offical ~ the guardian ~ mr.dune ~ oakstreet ~~
i’ve had full permission from mr.dune as a great friend to re build it , and put it back on a dedicated host once again.

~~~~~ server development team ~~~~~
i’ll be needing around 5 members to help me with this big project, u’ll be application for, if you don’t get accepted, your name wont be on this list, or i’ll say in a post.

story of the server
Mr.dune after hosting this server had decided to quit, when half way through of editing it, me and others of the development team will be restoreing the server, and fhinishing off the work, that him himself, didnt.
fair credits will be given to the people who did the most work ect. around the server, and also a menu on the server, which will tell the restoreing credits of the people who helped me, Must include the offical people who did make the server from scratch.
